text: "No Surrender" is a 1984 song by Bruce Springsteen and is the seventh track from his seventh studio album Born in the U.S.A.. It was not one of the seven top 10 singles from the album but charted at number 29 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: No Surrender (song)
